sides.name: Saugage patties, bacon, turkey bacon, or canadian bacon
Mega Tots
sides.description: Three jumbo golden tater tots stuffed with gooey cheddar cheese

eggDishes.name: Build your own Omelette
eggDishes.description: Three egg omelette served with toast. Add salmon for 3 Add turkey bacon or Beyond Sausage (v) for 2.50 Add bacon or avocado 2.25 Add Swiss, cheddar, Havarti, provolone, onion, tomato, apple, spinach, mushroom, broccoli, or peppers for .85 ea

eggDishes.name: Two Eggs Any Style
eggDishes.description: Served with white, wheat, or rye sourdough toast

eggDishes.name: Huevos Rancheros
eggDishes.description: Two eggs any style with tomatillo ranchero sauce, jack cheese, and refried beans on two corn tortillas. Served with a side of fried plantains

eggDishes.name: Truck Stop Special
eggDishes.description: Two eggs any style, one pancake, home fries, and your choice of sausage, bacon, or Beyond Sausage (v). Served with sourdough toast

eggDishes.name: Fritatta
eggDishes.description: Three eggs cooked with tomato, bacon, and potato. Topped with melted cheddar cheese & scallions

eggDishes.name: Breakfast Burrito
eggDishes.description: Scrambled eggs with mushroom, avocado, onion, and cheddar wrapped in a warm flour tortilla. Served with a side of fresh salsa

eggDishes.name: SouthWest Breakfast Burrito
eggDishes.description: Scrambled eggs, tomato, jalapeños, onion, refried beans, tortilla chips, and cheddar wrapped in a warm flour tortilla. Served with a side of fresh salsa

eggDishes.name: Breakfast Sandwich
eggDishes.description: Two eggs any style, melted cheddar cheese, and bacon or avocado, served open-faced on your choice of bagel, English muffin, or toast

eggDishes.name: Scrambled Egg Special
eggDishes.description: Three scrambled eggs served with home fries, an English muffin, and coffee

eggDishes.name: Eggs Benedict
eggDishes.description: Scrambled eggs, tomato, jalapeños, onion, refried beans, tortilla chips, and cheddar wrapped in a warm flour tortilla. Served with a side of fresh salsa

eggDishes.name: Mega Benedict
eggDishes.description: Two eggs any style, melted cheddar cheese, and bacon or avocado, served open-faced on your choice of bagel, English muffin, or toast

eggDishes.name: Choose Your Own Eggventure!
eggDishes.description: Three scrambled eggs served with home fries, an English muffin, and coffee

eggwagons.name: Homemade corned beef hash & eggs
eggwagons.description: Made with shredded brisket, potatoes, onions, cabbage, celery, carrots, and garlic. Topped with two eggs any style. Served with sourdough toast

eggwagons.name: Smoked Salmon Scramble
eggwagons.description: Smoked salmon scrambled with three eggs & chives. Served with a bagel & cream cheese

eggwagons.name: The Breakfast Skillet
eggwagons.description: Three eggs scrambled, sautéed with mushrooms & chicken-apple sausage or Beyond Sausage (v), and topped with Asiago cheese. Served with sourdough toast

eggwagons.name: Potato Chuckwagon
eggwagons.description: Shredded potatoes cooked with cheddar cheese and your choice of veggies and meat. Topped with two eggs any style and served with a side of sourdough toast. Choose one: chorizo, ham, or chicken apple sausage [or get Beyond Sausage (v) for an extra .50] Choose two: mushroom, tomato, peppers, onion

breakfastBowls.name: Tofu Scramble
breakfastBowls.description: Firm tofu scrambled with your choice of three vegetables: onion, tomato, spinach, mushroom, broccoli or peppers. Served with sourdough toast

breakfastBowls.name: Maple Nut Granola & Fresh Fruit Salad
breakfastBowls.description: Cantaloupe & honeydew melon, bananas, apples, strawberries, and grapes topped with vanilla or strawberry yogurt and granola

breakfastBowls.name: Savory Bacon & Cheddar
breakfastBowls.description: Chopped bacon, diced onion, tomato, cheddar cheese, and two sunny eggs Served over your choice of rice, farro or quinoa

breakfastBowls.name: Cranberry Maple Quinoa
breakfastBowls.description: Quinoa, dried cranberries, apples, bananas, almonds, vanilla yogurt. Served with pure maple syrup on the side

breakfastBowls.name: Kale Quinoa
breakfastBowls.description: Quinoa, squash, kale, chickpeas, and Asiago. Topped with two sunny eggs and a tomatillo drizzle

breakfastBowls.name: Mediterranean Quinoa
breakfastBowls.description: Fresh spinach topped with quinoa, feta, tomatoes, chickpeas, and two sunny eggs

bowlAdds.name: Impossible Meat (v), Tofu, Buffalo Chicken, or Chicken... 4 falafel

soups.name: Make it a Samsara
soups.description: Bowl of Soup or Simple Side Salad with a Half Sandwich. Choose from: Deluxe Grilled Cheese, Cape Codder, Avocado & Havarti Melt or a Tuna & Swiss Melt. Served with chips and a pickle.

shareables.name: Boneless Buffalo or BBQ Chicken Tenders

salads.name: Trident Signature Salad
salads.description: Dried cranberries, mandarin oranges, almonds, and Gorgonzola over mixed greens

salads.name: Carpese
salads.description: Fresh creamy mozzarella, tomatoes, and walnut pesto on a bed of mesclun greens

salads.name: Trident Cobb
salads.description: Cheddar, mozzarella, bacon, avocado, tomato, onion, and cucumber on a bed of green leaf lettuce

salads.name: Crunchy Western Ranch
salads.description: Corn, black beans, cheddar, tortilla chips, tomato, avocado, and mixed lettuces. Served with ranch dressing

salads.name: Beet & Arugula Salad
salads.description: Beet, walnut, apple, shaved fennel, and feta cheese over a bed of arugula

salads.name: Greek
salads.description: Chickpeas, pepperoncini, kalamata olives, cucumber, tomato, feta, and over fresh spinach

burgers.name: The Beyond Burger
burgers.description: A revolutionary burger that looks, cooks, & satisfies like beef

burgers.name: Turkey Burger
burgers.description: Handmade turkey patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and cranberry mayo on the side

burgers.name: Ranchero
burgers.description: Ground beef mixed with peppers and spices, topped with arugula and a spicy guacamole on Focaccia

burgers.name: The Impossible Burger
burgers.description: Plant-based burger that mimics real meat & sizzles on the grill

burgers.name: Black Bean
burgers.description: Made from scratch & served with fresh homemade salsa on the side

burgers.name: Trident Burger
burgers.description: Juicy all-beef hamburger with lettuce, tomato, and onion on the side

burgers.name: Salmon
burgers.description: Delicious hand made panko-crusted patty of seasoned salmon & haddock

burgerAdds.name: Cheddar, Dill Harvati, Provolone, smoked gouda, feta or swiss
Avocado, sautéed mushrooms, hummus, bacon, or turkey bacon

fromTheGriddle.name: Malted Belgian Waffle
fromTheGriddle.description: Topped with whipped cream and your choice of bananas or strawberries. Add granola, extra strawberries, or extra bananas for 1.65 each

fromTheGriddle.name: Chicken & Waffles
fromTheGriddle.description: Crispy chicken tenders on a malted Belgian waffle. Served with homemade white gravy

fromTheGriddle.name: Buttermilk Pankcakes
fromTheGriddle.description: Two large fluffy pancakes. Add blueberries, strawberries, granola, chocolate chips, or banana in or on the side for 1.65 each

fromTheGriddle.name: Challah Bread French Toast
fromTheGriddle.description: Delicious Challah bread dipped in cinnamon egg batter, and grilled to perfection. Add strawberries, granola, chocolate chips, or bananas on the side for 1.65 each

fromTheGriddle.name: Lemon Ricotta Stuffed French Toast
fromTheGriddle.description: Tart & creamy, our thick sliced Challah Bread with lemon cheese filling comes topped with blueberry sauce

fromTheGriddle.name: Morning Monte Cristo
fromTheGriddle.description: Two fried eggs, Canadian bacon, raspberry preserves, and cheddar cheese sandwiched between two slices of Challah bread French toast
